remarks: Sufficient condition for a set of the form ` { x e. ~P A | ph } ` to be a filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
statement:
isfild.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. F <-> ( x C_ A /\ ps ) ) ) $.
isfild.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
isfild.3 $e |- ( ph -> [. A / x ]. ps ) $.
isfild.4 $e |- ( ph -> -. [. (/) / x ]. ps ) $.
isfild.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y C_ A /\ z C_ y ) -> ( [. z / x ]. ps -> [. y / x ]. ps ) ) $.
isfild.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y C_ A /\ z C_ A ) -> ( ( [. y / x ]. ps /\ [. z / x ]. ps ) -> [. ( y i^i z ) / x ]. ps ) ) $.
isfild $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( Fil ` A ) ) $.

$d A y z $.
$d F x y $.
$d F y z $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps y $.
